USER_UPDATE.title: Profile Updated
USER_UPDATE.message: Your profile information has been updated by an administrator.

USER_STEP_DATA_UPDATE.title: Form Data Updated
USER_STEP_DATA_UPDATE.message: Your counselling form data has been updated by an administrator.

LIST_ASSIGNED.title: New College List Available
LIST_ASSIGNED.message: A new college list has been assigned to you. Check it out!

LIST_UPDATED.title: College List Updated
LIST_UPDATED.message: One of your college lists has been updated by an administrator.

LIST_REMOVED.title: College List Removed
LIST_REMOVED.message: A college list has been removed from your account by an administrator.

NOTE_ADDED.title: New Note Added
NOTE_ADDED.message: An administrator has added a new note to your profile.

PAYMENT_CONFIRMED.title: Payment Confirmed
PAYMENT_CONFIRMED.message: Your payment has been confirmed. Thank you!

COUNSELING_SESSION_SCHEDULED.title: Counseling Session Scheduled
COUNSELING_SESSION_SCHEDULED.message: Your counseling session has been scheduled. Check your calendar for details.

APPLICATION_STATUS_UPDATE.title: Application Status Update
APPLICATION_STATUS_UPDATE.message: There's an update to your college application status. Check it out!

HOME_UPDATE.title: You may have a new update
HOME_UPDATE.message: Check now for news and events.
